title: Need 1 more team to fill 16th slot!
body:
Dear Summoners,

Looking for one more team to close up the team limit. Currently have 15 teams and would love one last one.

Unfortunately, this is such short notice. The event is tonight at 6pm, so I don't expect anyone to sign up.
Another bummer is you won't be eligible for prizing due to the sign-ups actually being closed.

PM me in-game if you have a team ready and willing to play for some fun :^)

Cheers

replies.body: HEY can we still join, i got a team

> [{quoted}](name=Harri,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5BtBjFgE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-20T06:07:36.281+0000)
>
> HEY can we still join, i got a team

Msg Bollockz in game if you haven't already! :D
I know right, crazy to think that 75-80 people are competing. Sheesh.
There is hope for the OCE community!! :D
